item.description:
Our second meet up for February will be at Julian's in Providence.

THERE IS AN ATTENDENCE CAP OF 25 MEMBERS.

Please be sure if you RSVP "yes" that you can make it - that you actually CAN make it.

Julian's will be preparing a separate menu just for our group with a few vegetarian / vegan dishes to choose from.


A WRITE-UP ON JULIAN'S
Julian's, located in Providence, offers a few vegan options. They serve brunch everyday and they have a full bar with seating. Julian's dark and relaxed atmosphere is accented by unique designs and artwork displayed on the walls. Excellent service compliments their unusual and interesting dishes. Julian's is both a dining experience and trip to an art gallery all at once.

HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

~Kerrie

P.S.... WE WILL PLAN ON HAVING A POT LUCK MEET UP (or two) FOR OUR MARCH MEET UPS! Still looking for a large enough place to hold them... but I have a few new ideas to look into!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in with the host / hostess.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Meet Up at Julian's in Providence
